articles.description: Star forced mid-game tactical change
articles.content: Brisbane Broncos coach Kevin Walters might have urged the club's supporters to remain patient with his under-performing team, yet it was clear Walters' patience was running thin with Broncos playmake… [+2405 chars]

articles.title: ‘Milf had a nightmare’: Walters burns $1m protege as legends question confidence crisis - Fox Sports
articles.description: Broncos coach Kevin Walters has revealed Anthony Milford’s poor defence was the reason why the No.6 was moved from the right to the left-hand side of the field.
articles.content:
Milford had to defend Titans star David Fifita who proved to be too much for the playmaker as he slipped past to score two tries in the Gold Coasts win over Brisbane on Friday.
